definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: For a 60-watt incandescent, it’s just over $7 per year.
sentences.chinese: 一個60瓦白熾燈一年要花費7美元。

sentences.english: There was more hoopla surrounding the introduction of incandescent lights than there seems to be surrounding compact fluorescents.
sentences.chinese: 當時，引進白熾燈可比引進緊湊熒光燈熱鬧許多。

sentences.english: A fine wire heated electrically to incandescence in an electric lamp.
sentences.chinese: 白熾電燈的關鍵部分是燈泡裏的鎢絲。

sentences.english: AnThe utility model relates to an improvement of the existing incandescent lamp and lamp holder.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型是對現有白熾燈泡及燈座的改進。

sentences.english: The incandescent lamp was intruduced into people's life through its first display in a World's Fair.
sentences.chinese: 白熾燈是通過世博會的展示才被普及使用的。

sentences.english: It is unclear whether China will totally phase out production of incandescents.
sentences.chinese: 中國會否全面叫停白熾燈生產尚不明確。

sentences.english: A decent 60-watt incandescent costs less than a dollar.
sentences.chinese: 一個好看的60瓦白熾燈還不到1美元。

sentences.english: A 25-watt lamp was suspended from the ceiling, functioning to luminate us every night.
sentences.chinese: 頂上懸一個25瓦的白熾燈泡，在夜晚給予光明。

sentences.english: The back lamps continue to use incandescent bulbs instead of LEDs.
sentences.chinese: 後燈繼續使用的白熾燈泡的發光二極管代替。

sentences.english: Such luminous efficacy is probably beyond the scope of incandescent technology.
sentences.chinese: 這種照明效率可能就超出了白熾燈的技術範圍。

sentences.english: The European Union's drive to end the use of energy-wasting incandescent light bulbs will take practical effect next week.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟將從下週開始正式發起停用白熾燈泡的節能行動。

sentences.english: Her hair is a burning corona, her eyes are white-hot flakes .
sentences.chinese: 他的頭髮如燃燒的皇冠，他的眼中放射出白熾的火花。

sentences.english: Motion controlled single fixture spotlights are designed for incandescent bulbs and are inexpensive.
sentences.chinese: 運動控制的單夾具射燈設計用於白熾燈泡，而且便宜。

sentences.english: Repast illume uses bright incandescent lamp, lubricious feeling is downier .
sentences.chinese: 就餐照明用明亮的白熾燈，色感比較柔和。

sentences.english: Toshiba ended production of incandescent light bulbs Wednesday, ending a 120-year manufacturing history of the products.
sentences.chinese: 日本東芝公司17日起停止生產普通白熾燈泡。

sentences.english: The light of an electric lamp come from an incandescent filament.
sentences.chinese: 白熾電燈的關鍵部分是燈泡裏的鎢絲。
